=================================================
Non-4D Scanning Transmission Electron Microscopy
=================================================

This module constains a function called 'non4dstem'. This function takes a folder of files and plots them in an output folder. The files in the folder can be .dm4 files, .ser files, or .emd files. 

.. automodule:: non4dstem
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
